DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate functional vision associate rotational stability blink DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Toric ( DACP T ) compare 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® Astigmatism ( 1DAM A ) .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Assessment DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Astigmatism Compared 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: Must sign Informed Consent document ; Wear toric soft contact lens within protocolspecified range ; Cylinder equal high 0.75 diopter ( D ) eye ; Have acceptable fit study contact lenses ; Willing wear lens minimum 5 day per week , 6 hour per day , every day , possible ; Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/30 Snellen ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular infection , inflammation , abnormality , disease would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use systemic ocular medication would contraindicate contact lens wear , determine investigator ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Require presbyopic correction ; Any ocular condition observe examination enrollment visit ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery irregular cornea ; Pregnant lactating ; Participation clinical trial within 30 day enrollment visit ; Currently wear Focus® DAILIES® Toric 1DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® Astigmatism ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
